title: Working Apple-1 first batch computer up for auction with Steve Jobs handwritten serial number
content:
Apple-1 computers are rare and have increased considerably in value over the past decades with working units going for over $700,000. Now a special Apple-1 first batch computer with its serial number handwritten by Steve Jobs is up for auction.

moreâ€¦

The post Working Apple-1 first batch computer up for auction with Steve Jobs handwritten serial number appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A rare, working Apple-1 first batch computer with a serial number handwritten by Steve Jobs is up for auction starting from $250,000.
